column6: Reporting to COO, managing land acquisitions, transfers and other property transactions pre/post Olympics, with particular responsibility for the commercial aspects of the development, management and delivery of the Olympic Village and the Stratford City Retail Centre
column7: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
column19: Salaries of staff at SCS1 or equivalent are not disclosed. Post now reports to COO

column6: Reporting to the Director of Village and Commercial. Taking responsibility for leading the development of design, town planning, regulatory compliance pre construction and through the construction process. Leading the delivery of the Athletes Village to assure product quality of all assets, through the construction process, through the Olympics period, through retrofit and into Legacy completion/handover processes to final disposal. Managing the interface with Triathlon and maximising the development potential of the undeveloped areas left vacant until post Olympics.
column7: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
column19: Salaries of staff at SCS1 or equivalent are not disclosed. Post now reports to COO

column6: Reporting to the COO, monitors and assures overall delivery of the  programme financial obligations.
column7: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
column19: Salaries of staff at SCS1 or equivalent are not disclosed.

column6: Responsible for managing the procurement and commercial  activities of the ODA ensuring that the ODA complies with its statutory obligations and policies. Also provides assurance and professional leadership to a team of procurement and commercial managers and is responsible for ensuring commerciality in activities of the ODA. From 1st October becomes Director of Legal and Commercial and assumes responsibility  for legal services.
column7: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
column19: Salaries of staff at SCS1 or equivalent are not disclosed. Direct Reports less than 5

column6: Dual reporting to COO and Director of Village and Commercial, leads the provision of legal services and responsible for delivery of ODA Exit activities and Dissolution Order
column7: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
column19: Salaries of staff at SCS1 or equivalent are not disclosed.

column6: Responsible for overall leadership and management of the ODA, including responsibilities as Accounting Officer
column7: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

column6: Leading the management of the East Village work programme, commissioned by the ODA, setting clear programme objectives and ensuring delivery to strict timescales and budgets aswell as ensuring commerciality in activities of the ODA.
column7: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

column6: Responsible for developing and maintaining appropriate programme governance structures and providing assurance that they operate effectively. Provides oversight and challenge of all programme performance monitoring, providing assurance of the integrity of reporting and programme management systems. Provides oversight and challenge of risk management at project and programme level. Provides management information on programme performance.
column7: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
column19: Salaries of staff at SCS1 or equivalent are not disclosed. Direct Reports less than 5

column6: Responsible for financial management of the ODA, to ensure effective use of public funds/alignment with business objectives.
column7: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
column19: Salaries of staff at SCS1 or equivalent are not disclosed. Direct Reports less than 5
